'''Gold-Standard Healthy Meal''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Forest of Color]] with [[Iansan]]. The [[recipe]] for Forest of Color can be obtained during [[World Quest]] ''[[To the Night, What is the Night's]]'', from a [[Chest]] found next to [[Legba]].
